name: market-parser-polygon-mcp
description: Market Parser - Python CLI and Gradio UI for financial queries using Polygon.io MCP server and OpenAI GPT-5-mini

scripts.lint:fix: uv run black src/backend/ tests/ --line-length 100 && uv run isort src/backend/ tests/ --profile black --line-length 100
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && npm run install:all
scripts.status: echo '=== Gradio UI Status ===' && (curl -s http://localhost:8000 > /dev/null && echo 'Gradio UI running on http://localhost:8000' || echo 'Gradio UI not running')

author: Market Parser Team
